content: in 2021 a notary named mr s from xxx is assisting mr c and mrs t in their divorce proceedings they have reached agreements on the division of their property custody of their child and financial contributions the parties have chosen to file a joint petition for divorce in a specific family court and will share the costs equally they have confirmed their identity and marital status with the notary who has informed them of their rights and obligations the notary has provided a digital copy of the deed through a secure online platform the parties have received a draft document before the final execution and any amendments were communicated in advance the parties signed the document in the presence of the notary and a certified copy was registered the registration fees and transcription fees were paid accordingly
